Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.name: shouldProcessNamespaces
Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.abstract: Parser reports the namespaces and qualified names of elements. (defaults to false)

Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.name: shouldReportNamespacePrefixes
Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.abstract: Parser reports the prefixes indicating the scope of namespace declarations. (defaults to false)

Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.name: shouldResolveExternalEntities
Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.abstract: Parser reports declarations of external entities. (defaults to false)

Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.name: shouldTrimWhitespace
Structs/AEXMLOptions/ParserSettings.html.abstract: Parser should trim whitespace from text nodes. (defaults to true)

Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.name: version
Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.abstract: Version value for XML Document header (defaults to 1.0).

Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.name: encoding
Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.abstract: Encoding value for XML Document header (defaults to “utf-8”).

Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.name: standalone
Structs/AEXMLOptions/DocumentHeader.html.abstract: Standalone value for XML Document header (defaults to “no”).

Structs/AEXMLOptions.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: documentHeader
Structs/AEXMLOptions.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Values used in XML Document header (defaults to DocumentHeader())

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5AEXMLE10xml.name: xmlEscaped
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5AEXMLE10xml.abstract: String representation of self with XML special characters escaped.

Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.name: elementNotFound
Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.abstract: This will be inside error property of AEXMLElement when subscript is used for not-existing element.

Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.name: rootElementMissing
Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.abstract: This will be inside error property of AEXMLDocument when there is no root element.

Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.name: parsingFailed
Enums/AEXMLError.html#/s:5AEXML10AEXMLEr.abstract: AEXMLDocument can throw this error on init or loadXMLData if parsing with XMLParser was not successful.

Enums/AEXMLError.html.name: AEXMLError
Enums/AEXMLError.html.abstract: A type representing error value that can be thrown or inside error property of AEXMLElement.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: parent
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Every AEXMLElement should have its parent element instead of AEXMLDocument which parent is nil.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: children
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Child XML elements.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: name
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: XML Element name.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: value
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: XML Element value.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: attributes
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: XML Element attributes.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: error
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Error value (nil if there is no error).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: string
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: String representation of value property (if value is nil this is empty String).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: bool
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Boolean representation of value property (nil if value can’t be represented as Bool).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: int
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Integer representation of value property (nil if value can’t be represented as Integer).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: double
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Double representation of value property (nil if value can’t be represented as Double).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: init(name:value:attributes:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Designated initializer - all parameters are optional.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: The first element with given name (Empty element with error if not exists).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: all
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns all of the elements with equal name as self (nil if not exists).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: first
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns the first element with equal name as self (nil if not exists).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: last
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns the last element with equal name as self (nil if not exists).

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: count
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns number of all elements with equal name as self.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: all(withValue:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns all elements with given value.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: all(containingAttributeKeys:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns all elements containing given attributes.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: all(withAttributes:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns all elements with given attributes.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: allDescendants(where:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns all descendant elements which satisfy the given predicate.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: firstDescendant(where:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Returns the first descendant element which satisfies the given predicate, or nil if no such element is found.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: hasDescendant(where:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Indicates whether the element has a descendant satisfying the given predicate.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: addChild(_:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Adds child XML element to self.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: addChild(name:value:attributes:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Adds child XML element to self.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: addChildren(_:)
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Adds an array of XML elements to self.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: removeFromParent()
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Removes self from parent XML element.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: xml
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Complete hierarchy of self and children in XML escaped and formatted String

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: xmlCompact
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Same as xmlString but without \n and \t characters

Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.name: xmlSpaces
Classes/AEXMLElement.html#/s:5AEXML12AEX.abstract: Same as xmlString but with 4 spaces instead ‘\t’ characters

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: root
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Root (the first child element) element of XML Document (Empty element with error if not exists).

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: init(root:options:)
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Designated initializer - Creates and returns new XML Document object.

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: init(xml:options:)
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Convenience initializer - used for parsing XML data (by calling loadXMLData: internally).

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: init(xml:encoding:options:)
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Convenience initializer - used for parsing XML string (by calling init(xmlData:options:) internally).

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: loadXML(_:)
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Creates instance of AEXMLParser (private class which is simple wrapper around XMLParser)

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.name: xml
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html#/s:5AEXML13AE.abstract: Override of xml property of AEXMLElement - it just inserts XML Document header at the beginning.

Classes/AEXMLDocument.html.name: AEXMLDocument
Classes/AEXMLDocument.html.abstract: This class is inherited from AEXMLElement and has a few addons to represent XML Document.

Classes/AEXMLElement.html.name: AEXMLElement
Classes/AEXMLElement.html.abstract: This is base class for holding XML structure.
